entry.title: Trader May Have Lost $9M in Exit from USDT Data Indicates Bots Made Off With Huge Sum on Arbitrum
entry.summary: Data Indicates Bots Made Off With Huge Sum on Arbitrum

entry.title: Terra Network Shuts Down Again; Binance Delists LUNA and UST Pairs
entry.summary: Terra Stops and Starts to Salvage Network

entry.title: Lido Increases Liquidity Incentives as stETH Trades at Discount to ETH
entry.summary: Lido Finance has announced $1.3M in new incentives to improve stETH:ETH liquidity.

entry.title: Terra Temporarily Halts Blockchain To Prevent Governance Attack
entry.summary: The Terra blockchain was halted to deploy an emergency upgrade intended to forestall governance attacks.

entry.title: USDT Briefly Slips Below $1 Peg as Terra Contagion Spreads
entry.summary: Crypto's largest stablecoin USDT traded as low as $0.95 overnight before recovering.
